Severe Weather Alert Notification System.name: Severe Weather Alert Notification System
Severe Weather Alert Notification System.description: Handles the end-to-end process of receiving, processing, and displaying severe weather alerts, including the type of weather, affected geographic area, and recommended actions for users.

stories.name: Receive immediate severe weather alerts
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to receive immediate notifications for severe weather events in my area so that I can take timely protective action.

stories.name: Understand severe weather type
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to see the type of severe weather event (e.g., tornado, flood, blizzard) so that I understand the specific threat.

stories.name: Identify affected geographic area
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to know the specific geographic area impacted by the alert so that I can determine if I am in danger.

stories.name: Receive recommended actions
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to receive clear instructions on recommended actions (e.g., 'seek shelter,' 'evacuate') so that I know how to protect myself and my family.

stories.name: Publish Weather Alert
stories.description: As a weather alert administrator, I want to publish a weather alert so that it is delivered to affected users promptly.

stories.name: Receive weather alerts via email
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive weather alerts via email so that I have a detailed record of important weather information.

stories.name: Receive weather alerts via SMS
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive weather alerts via SMS so that I can get critical updates even when I have limited internet access.

Forecast Notification System.name: Forecast Notification System
Forecast Notification System.description: Handles the end-to-end process of sending and receiving weather forecast notifications (daily and periodic), including backend delivery and frontend display.

stories.name: Receive Daily Forecast Notification
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive a daily forecast notification at my chosen time and for my selected location so that I am prepared for the day's weather.

stories.name: Receive Periodic Forecast Notification
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive periodic forecast notifications on my selected schedule and for my chosen location so that I get timely updates throughout the week.

Weather Advisory Notification System.name: Weather Advisory Notification System
Weather Advisory Notification System.description: Handles the end-to-end process of delivering and displaying timely notifications for non-severe but important weather advisories to users.

stories.name: Receive Timely Weather Notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive timely notifications for weather advisories relevant to my location so that I am aware of non-severe but important conditions.
